data.persona: I am a juror on a case. I am not sure I should be in a court room. I wear all black almost every day.
data.description:
You are in the clean water lake.
The lake is crystal clear, lined with trees, to the far back of the lake there's a small formation of rocks almost like a small waterfall allowing water to flow into the lake. It's quite beautiful, the sun bathing the surrounding area in a warmth so comforting you could easily fall asleep on the shore. There's an old wooden bath, for its age it seems to look like almost new, and rarely used. There are no animals nearby except for birds softly chirping in the trees.
The court jester is here.

You are carrying a Quill and a scroll, wearing a shoes, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I want to give my ball to the court jester, because I know he likes juggling.
data.mid_motivation: I want the jester to think of me when he juggles my ball.
data.long_motivation: I hope the jester and I can start to become better friends.
